name: Security vulnerability report
about: Report a security vulnerability privately to the maintainers
labels: security
title: 'SECURITY: '

---

Please **do not** include exploit code or PoC in a public issue. If you need to share PoC, mark it clearly and request a private channel.

Required information:
- Affected version(s) or commit SHA
- Steps to reproduce (high level)
- Impact (confidentiality, integrity, availability)
- Contact information (email) for follow-up

We will respond within 3 business days.
